using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace area
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            long n = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());
            long p = n / 4;
            Console.WriteLine(Math.Pow(p, 2));
        }
    }
}
